text: Henry Gibson (September 21, 1935 â€“ September 14, 2009) was an American actor, singer and songwriter. He was best known as a cast member of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In, for his role as Haven Hamilton in Nashville, for his recurring role as Judge Clark Brown on Boston Legal, the Illinois Nazi leader in The Blues Brothers and as Bob Jenkins in King of the Hill. ==Other websites== * * Obituary at the Daily Telegraph Category:1935 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer of unknown primary origin Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television personalities Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Comedians from Pennsylvania Category:Singers from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Pennsylvania
title: Henry Gibson
